results.title: The modifier effect of physical activity, body mass index, and age on the association of metformin and chronic back pain: A cross-sectional analysis of 21,899 participants from the UK Biobank
results.text_hl: We investigated whether people using @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ reported a higher prevalence of @<m>DISEASE_Low_Back_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017116 @@@chronic low back pain@@@ than those who did not.

citations.NLM: Carvalho-E-Silva AP, Ferreira PH, Harmer AR, Hartvigsen J, Ferreira ML. The modifier effect of physical activity, body mass index, and age on the association of metformin and chronic back pain: A cross-sectional analysis of 21,899 participants from the UK Biobank PLoS One. 2023;18(2):e0282205. PMID: 36854023

results.title: Reduced mortality from lower respiratory tract disease in adult diabetic patients treated with metformin.
results.text_hl: Reduced mortality from @<m>DISEASE_Low_Back_Pain</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017116 @@@lower@@@ @DISEASE_Respiratory_Tract_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D012140 @@@respiratory tract disease@@@ in adult @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Mendy A, Gopal R, Alcorn JF, Forno E. Reduced mortality from lower respiratory tract disease in adult diabetic patients treated with metformin. Respirology. 2019 Jul;24(7):646-651. PMID: 30761687
